1.caption_en:
A landscape "Platform Monetization Canvas v5.0" template showing operational, acquisition and unit cost columns on the left and multi-year revenue tables (Consumers, Producers, Partners) on the right, with summary blocks for Total Costs, Ecosystem Impact, and Total Revenue along the bottom.

{
  "artifact_type": "template/worksheet",
  "title": "Platform Monetization Canvas",
  "version": "v5.0",
  "language": "EN",
  "orientation": "landscape",
  "description": "A printable business template for mapping platform costs and revenue streams, divided into cost columns, revenue tables, and bottom summary sections.",
  "layout_summary": {
    "left_column": [
      "OPERATIONAL COSTS",
      "ACQUISITION COSTS",
      "UNIT COSTS"
    ],
    "right_column": {
      "year_columns": 3,
      "tables": [
        {
          "name": "CONSUMERS REVENUES",
          "rows": [
            "TOTAL NUMBER",
            "ACCESS REVENUE",
            "TRANSACTION REVENUE",
            "DATA REVENUE",
            "OTHERS REVENUE",
            "TOTAL REVENUE"
          ]
        },
        {
          "name": "PRODUCERS REVENUES",
          "rows": [
            "TOTAL NUMBER",
            "ACCESS REVENUE",
            "TRANSACTION REVENUE",
            "DATA REVENUE",
            "OTHERS REVENUE",
            "TOTAL REVENUE"
          ]
        },
        {
          "name": "PARTNER REVENUES",
          "rows": [
            "TOTAL NUMBER",
            "ACCESS REVENUE",
            "TRANSACTION REVENUE",
            "DATA REVENUE",
            "OTHERS REVENUE",
            "TOTAL REVENUE"
          ]
        }
      ]
    },
    "bottom_sections": [
      "TOTAL COSTS",
      "ECOSYSTEM IMPACT",
      "TOTAL REVENUE"
    ],
    "footer": {
      "branding": [
        "PIK (logo)",
        "fb (logo) and QR code"
      ],
      "title_field": "blank title field for user input"
    }
  },
  "visible_text": [
    "OPERATIONAL COSTS",
    "What are the costs to operate the platform business?",
    "ACQUISITION COSTS",
    "What are the costs to acquire the different stakeholders?",
    "UNIT COSTS",
    "What are the costs to 'produce' the offered services for you as a platform?",
    "CONSUMERS REVENUES",
    "TOTAL NUMBER",
    "ACCESS REVENUE",
    "TRANSACTION REVENUE",
    "DATA REVENUE",
    "OTHERS REVENUE",
    "TOTAL REVENUE",
    "PRODUCERS REVENUES",
    "PARTNER REVENUES",
    "TOTAL COSTS",
    "ECOSYSTEM IMPACT",
    "TOTAL REVENUE",
    "PLATFORM MONETIZATION CANVAS v5.0"
  ],
  "notes": {
    "intended_use": "Business planning and monetization modeling for platform-based products/services",
    "editable_fields": "Year columns, numeric revenue/cost fields, title",
    "colors": "muted greys for cost/summary blocks, colored bands for revenue table headings (orange/green/yellow)",
    "data_granularity": "per-year columns for multiple years"
  }
}

2.caption_en: Slide titled "Sustainability by Design" highlighting three initiatives: Dedicated Areas for Ecosystem Impact, Updated Guides to help users consider sustainability when using the canvas, and Support for the UN Sustainable Development Goals.
2.caption_ru: Slide titled "Sustainability by Design" highlighting three initiatives: Dedicated Areas for Ecosystem Impact, Updated Guides to help users consider sustainability when using the canvas, and Support for the UN Sustainable Development Goals.

4.caption_en:
A printed "Platform Business Model v5.0" one-page canvas template showing labeled sections for Suppliers, Investors, Supporters, Core Services, Value Proposition, Consumers/Producers with a central "CORE NETWORK EFFECTS" area and bottom rows for Cost Structure and Value Capture.

  "artifact_type": "business model canvas template",
  "title": "Platform Business Model v5.0",
  "language": "English",

5.caption_en:
Sustainability by Design is an informational slide highlighting features to help platform designers integrate ecosystem impact, including dedicated canvas areas, updated online guides, and alignment with the UN Sustainable Development Goals. The left shows sample platform canvases while the right lists three benefits with icons and brief descriptions.

{
  "title": "Sustainability by Design",
  "type": "informational slide / infographic",
  "image_dimensions": [3840, 1626],
  "language": "English",
  "caption": "Sustainability by Design is an informational slide highlighting features to help platform designers integrate ecosystem impact, including dedicated canvas areas, updated online guides, and alignment with the UN Sustainable Development Goals.",
  "layout": {
    "title_position": "top-left",
    "left_column": "two small images of platform canvases (Platform Business Model, Platform Monetization Canvas)",
    "right_column": "three stacked feature rows, each with an icon, heading, and short description; UN SDG logo near lower-right",
    "background": "white with ample whitespace"
  },
  "dominant_colors": ["lime green (#c6d835 approximate)", "gray", "white", "teal/blue accents"],
  "main_headings": [
    "Sustainability by Design",
    "Dedicated Areas for Ecosystem Impact",
    "Updated Guides",
    "Support UN SDGs"
  ],
  "icons_and_logos": [
    {
      "type": "icon",
      "description": "leaf/flower in a rounded square (green) used near the title and next to the first feature"
    },
    {
      "type": "icon",
      "description": "QR code with magnifying glass used next to the 'Updated Guides' feature"
    },
    {
      "type": "logo",
      "description": "UN Sustainable Development Goals multicolor logo used next to 'Support UN SDGs' feature"
    }
  ],
  "left_panel_content": "Visual representations of 'Platform Business Model' canvas and 'Platform Monetization Canvas' with sections for ecosystem impact and monetization; smaller text and template fields visible but not fully legible at this scale.",
  "text_snippets": [
    "Sustainability by Design",
    "Each canvas contains specific areas for ecosystem impact",
    "Dedicated Areas for Ecosystem Impact",
    "Updated Guides",
    "Our newly designed online guide will support you to consider sustainability aspects while using the canvas.",
    "Support UN SDGs",
    "While designing platform businesses we recommend to consider the UN SDGs and select the goals you want to support with your platform",
    "PLATFORM BUSINESS MODEL v5.0",
    "PLATFORM MONETIZATION CANVAS v4.0"
  ],
  "purpose": [
    "Promote sustainable design practices for platform businesses",
    "Showcase updated guidance and templates to integrate ecosystem impact",
    "Encourage alignment with UN Sustainable Development Goals"
  ],
  "suggested_uses": ["presentation slide", "workshop handout", "reference sheet for design teams"]
}
